headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Discounts
content:
No one's ever swooned looking out of a street-view window. Grab yourself a little slice of deluxe living in the sky: The Diamond's Master Penthouse is 20% off and all of its customization options are 30% off through February 16. There are also several vehicles on sale this week:

Dewbauchee JB 700 – 30% off
Vapid Retinue Mk II – 30% off
Declasse Drift Yosemite – 30% off
Albany Roosevelt Valor – 40% off

And more! Check out the Rockstar Newswire for more details.
